Test2::Compare::Meta(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation Test2::Compare::Meta(3)

NAME

Test2::Compare::Meta - Check library for meta-checks

DESCRIPTION

Sometimes in a deep comparison you want to run extra checks against an item down the chain. This library allows you to write a check that verifies several attributes of an item.

DEFINED CHECKS

blessed
Lets you check that an item is blessed, and that it is blessed into the expected class.
reftype
Lets you check the reftype of the item.
this
Lets you check the item itself.
size
Lets you check the size of the item. For an arrayref this is the number of elements. For a hashref this is the number of keys. For everything else this is undef.

SOURCE

The source code repository for Test2-Suite can be found at https://github.com/Test-More/Test2-Suite/.
